long_description: The RFID Neck Security Wallet from REI is the perfect travel companion to help you combat ID theft. It blocks access to personal data stored on passport, credit card and ID micro chips. Special liner helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. 2 zippered compartments accommodate passport and cards; fold-down, rip-and-stick flap secures over top. Water-resistant, ripstop nylon stands up to wear and tear. Adjustable neck strap.
short_description: The RFID Neck Security Wallet from REI is the perfect travel companion to help you combat ID theft. It blocks access to personal data stored on passport, credit card and ID micro chips.
